summary:
The human brain is a crazy place, and there are two things that fascinate me most: product placement and growth marketing. First: the concept of the consumer logic and how rational yet irrational it can be. And second: the challenge of communicating in a way that persuades and convinces consumers, always requires optimization – so in the end you’re optimizing for something both rational and irrational.

I apply the same thinking in product marketing that I also apply in leadership, because whether you’re connecting with consumers or with your team, you’re connecting with the fun irrationality of their logic – in order to bring ideas together, influence and outcome, and also optimize and scale for future growth.

I have always had entrepreneur spirit; this is something that allows me to work alone very well but also in a team where you can rely on each other and spar ideas to reach your end goal together. 

Outside of work, I like to take different sport classes, I find that this also challenges me in a way that makes me really happy. An hour where I can release stress and gain new skills ex) improve my reaction time with kickboxing. I also like to volunteer when I can, I try to help food kitchens and elderly homes when I can find some time. Communicating with individuals from such different walks of life is always inspiring to me and I find their stories so fascinating to listen to. But my most favourite activity outside of work is spending time and walking my dog, there is nothing like getting some fresh air, running around and seeing the joy on his face.

profile_positions.description: Good people. Great dumplings. A whole lot of tradition, made with love.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Founded in the Netherlands in 2006, Blue Billywig is a full service, holistic Online Video Platform, that enables effortless management, hosting, publishing, analysis and monetisation of publisher content. The platform offers extensive possibilities for your videos such as a customisable video player, instream, and outstream advertising solutions, live-streaming and interactivity 360° video.
profile_positions.title: International Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Gone are the days where posting to your Facebook page is enough. With so much in everyone's newsfeed your business needs something that stands out against the rest. Facebook advertising allows businesses to reach the right people, capture their attention and drive results by putting your business at the fingertips.  
That's where we come in. As a Facebook Ads Consultant, we providing small to medium sized businesses with a Facebook advertising strategy, creating end-to-end marketing solutions that align with your business’ goals.  We start with your goals, we focus on targeting the right potential new customers, & we build ads that those people want to see. We're the experts in maximizing how to use your advertising dollars to drive real results rather than fluffed up stats.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
301 Mobile is a mobile marketing company based out of Amsterdam. We provide entertaining and engaging mobile products and content to consumers across the world in the form of video, music, sweepstakes, games and applications.

With many years of experience in the mobile marketing industry, we have assembled a team of unrivaled talent focused on delivering the highest quality mobile experiences and continuing to innovate through technology, dedication, and creativity.
profile_positions.title: CEO & Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Avazu Holding. is a global leader of PC and mobile digital advertising that has connected advertisers with their target audience since 2009. With offices in Shanghai, Beijing , Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Berlin, Tokyo, Brunei, Los Angeles, Toronto and most recently Buenos Aires and Brasilia, Avazu is collaborating with over 500 of the largest international advertising clients.

Avazu Holding consists of 4 business units:
Avazu Inc, a global cross-device performance advertising company with proprietary technologies for programmatic advertising.
Teebik, a global game publisher;
DotC, a Global App publisher and
aFund, a strategic investment arm focusing on seed- to early-stage startups.

Avazu Holding is privately funded and raised a Series A of 48 million USD in 2014, in Q2 2015 its advertising business Avazu was announced to become publicly listed in China within a 2.08 billion RMB transaction (002354).
profile_positions.title: Account Director

profile_positions.description:
Avazu Inc. is a global leader of PC & mobile digital advertising, a global mobile games and distribution platform. Established in 2009 in Germany, Avazu had its headquarters set up in Shanghai China the same year.

Avazu recently secured $48 million of Series A financing from Banyan Capital, together with another prominent investment fund and several serial entrepreneurs. With offices in Shanghai China, Beijing China, Hong Kong China, Amsterdam, Berlin,Tokyo, Brunei, Los Angeles and most recently Toronto, Avazu is collaborating with over 500 of the largest international advertising clients.

Avazu Holding consists of three business units:
Avazu Inc, a global cross-device performance advertising company with proprietary technologies for programmatic advertising.
Teebik, a global game publisher; and
aFund, a strategic investment arm focusing on seed- to early-stage startups.
profile_positions.title: Head of Advertisers Avazu Europe

profile_positions.title: Head Cashier

volunteer_experiences.description:
Soup Kitchen Volunteer:

To assist in preparation for and delivery of a weekly Soup Kitchen for people
who are homeless or living in food poverty. Weekly I would work in the kitchen at the Salvation Army in downtown Vancouver and help in the kitchen.  


Duties would range from:
 Prepare soup
 Prepare other food (e.g. slice bread/cake)
 Lay tables
 Prepare hot drinks table
 Serve tea and coffee
 Serve soup and other food
 Socialise with/chat to guests
 Tidy and clear away
 Wash up
